clue_types.name: Exact location
clue_types.description: The Hiders' exact location on a map is sent to the Seekers.

clue_types.name: Selfie
clue_types.description:
The Hiders must send the Seekers a selfie of their whole team at arm's length, including their surroundings. “Surroundings” is defined as: 

- The exterior of your nearest building, including its roof,
- OR the interior of the building you are in,
- OR if neither are possible, then your photo must capture your general surroundings and can be definitively be photo-matched to the IRL spot it was taken at, with no room for doubt.

If the Hiders don't respond within 1 minute, their exact location will automatically be revealed to the Seekers.

clue_types.name: Closest landmark...
clue_types.description:
The Seekers will chose one of the following landmarks.

1. named street
2. library
3. museum
4. parking lot

The Hiders must tell the Seekers the the name of the chosen landmark type. If the Hiders don't respond within 1 minute, their exact location will automatically be revealed to the Seekers.

clue_types.name: Relative direction
clue_types.description: The Seekers will learn the cardinal directions of any Hider teams within the clue range, relative to the Seeker's current location.

clue_types.name: Distance from Seekers
clue_types.description: The Seekers will learn their straight-line distance to any Hider teams within the clue range.
